nodes.bodyText: if there is no monitorAddress field in json, would this overwrite the default with some empty/null value?
Fixed. Tested with values "", null and empty json {}

in future, might be worth putting it in separate function and have tests for it.
Also would have been better just crashing if parsing/loading config fails like in our importer/grpc/etc, but meh, this is still just a simple component.
lgtm.
